name: Georgia
notes: Georgia is a common out-of-state plate seen in Florida tolls. Uses both digit 0 and letter O. Zero appears with a slash through it to distinguish from O. County name appears on a sticker at the top of the plate. Multiple formats exist including ABC-1234 and older AAA-123 formats.

plate_types.description: Current standard passenger format with county sticker
plate_types.sticker_description: County name sticker at top center of plate

plate_types.description: Older passenger plate format still in circulation
plate_types.sticker_description: County sticker at top, may have month/year tabs
